sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail has been groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 4, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/1 and 2/2.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skating was actually really good from 12 to 3 today.  A few areas started to get slushy but overall was good.  Classic tracks looked good in the woods.  Still a double track for most of the trail.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: This morning’s  snow  was the icing on the cake over a well layered and constructed base . Beautiful groom - well done Nubs crew ! LF 7

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 lifts, Space Worm and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked yesterday morning, and are in great shape.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Welcome to a cold and clear day at Nub's Nob. The skiing continues to be fabulous, thanks to the unusual amounts of natural snow we've received and the close attention of the Grooming Crew. The forecast is calling for a high near 20, with a breeze decreasing through the day. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
